listing.listing_description: Adults and children alike will get a kick out of Villa Equinox. Perched on the coast of Sea Breeze Hills in Cap Estate, the villa has breathtaking ocean views as well as two pools and even a swim-up bar. Four suite-style bedrooms, spacious living areas with Caribbean flair, and cook service ensure you’ll stay in privacy and luxury.Start your day at Villa Equinox with breakfast on the veranda, then move to the adjacent sitting area, a lounge chair on the lawn, or one of several chaises on the pool terrace. The villa’s main pool has a freeform shape crossed by a bridge, a swim-up bar and views of the ocean just below. There’s also a more private plunge pool off the master suite. Prepare dinner on the barbecue, and in the evenings, gather around the television or browse the Internet for entertainment. With cook and housekeeping services included in your stay, all you have to do is relax.The villa is laid out around a long, airy living and dining room with vaulted ceilings, creamy stone floors and several pairs of French doors opening to the veranda. The living room’s wood-framed sofas have neutral-toned upholstery accented by palm-print pillows, and in the dining room, the same pairing of wood and beige upholstery has traditional Caribbean elegance. The fully equipped kitchen is all modern charm with pale wood cabinets and charcoal gray stone countertops.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Equinox has an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. There are two bedrooms with king beds, one of which has access to a private plunge pool, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. As in the rest of the house, neutral walls and floors and dark wood furniture are set off by brightly colored bedding for a traditionally tropical feel.It wouldn’t be a vacation on St-Lucia without a day at the beach, so take time to explore the many nearby beaches only a short drive away. Reserve a tee time at Championship Golf Course, a 3.5 km drive from the villa, and discover local fare in the towns of Gros Islet, just over 5.5 km away, and Rodney Bay, 6.5 km away. From Villa Equinox, it’s about a 16 km drive to the island’s George F.L. Charles Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa del Mar offers you unsurpassed luxury and comfort in the magical beachfront setting of Belizean Cove Estates. There’s no escaping the picture-perfect unobstructed view of Ambergris Caye and the sparkling Caribbean.Exceptional Villa Del Mar commands an enviable upper floor view and features expansive vaulted ceilings in many of the rooms, adding to the airy and spacious feeling of this marvelous apartment. All around you are those wonderful views of the Caribbean Sea and Belize’s famous barrier reef, tantalizingly close. Copious windows and doors and outside spaces, including private balconies, terraces and verandahs mean you can easily let the outside in or step into the Belize climate and soak up those fabulous vistas. Luxuriously and comfortably equipped Villa Del Mar features custom designed furniture from Bali, antique carved wood panels, and the colorful artwork of prominent Belizean artists such as Walter Castillo. Your apartment truly reflects Belizean culture but still provides you all the luxuries and comforts of home. There’s a great deal to keep you entertained, including a gourmet kitchen, cable television, Internet, LCD television with movie collection and stereo system, all air-cooled by ceiling fans and air conditioning.Set in the tropical oasis of Belizean Cove Estates there’s everything you need to maximize outdoor living. The Estate’s wonderful and impeccable pool area perfectly frames your view of the Caribbean. Here you can start your day with a dip in the pool, soak your cares away in the hot tub or wander down to the beach and take time out in a sea kayak, the perfect way to explore the Caye.Your three restful and elegantly furnished bedrooms all include en-suite bathrooms. For your utmost comfort all beds are topped with a pillow top mattress and fine luxurious bed linens and all rooms are furnished with television, air conditioning and ceiling fan. Your deluxe en-suite bathrooms also feature jetted tubs and opulent marble finishes.Villa del Mar truly is an exceptional apartment in an ideal location to enjoy the largest of Belize’s islands. San Pedro Town is just 3 miles away and just one mile to the tennis and basketball courts. The famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, runs the entire length of this magical island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to five-star living at Cawha Chalet! With custom craftsmanship, you’ll be dazzled upon entrance. Breckenridge started as a mining town and is now a popular ski resort in Summit County. Part of the Rocky Mountains, the area provides some great opportunities for winter sports enthusiasts and, with lovely summertime activities, also makes a great destination for a family holiday year round.This home has everything you could want to make your stay unforgettable. After a day on the slopes, you can saunter back to your chalet, where you can relax and unwind in the private outdoor hot tub with amazing views. For the athletes in the group, Cawha Chalet also features a exercise room with a small flat screen television! The main living space boasts a gorgeous living area with high ceilings, a beautiful stone gas fireplace, hardwood floors, a flat screen television and elegant furnishings.Douglas Fir beams throughout the home give it an elegant, rustic feel. The gourmet kitchen is any chef’s dream with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, and there is even a breakfast bar! Not in the mood to cook? Then grill something succulent on the outdoor gas barbeque. The dining area, where there is room for twelve, is surrounded by windows showcasing the mountainous views for you and all your guests to marvel.For privacy and space, Cawha Chalet comes equipped with an individual bathroom for each bedroom. This high-end home can sleep up to thirteen guests with three kings, two twins, one bunk bed and one captain’s bunk (twin over double). To relax after a long day on the slopes, indulge in the fabulous king-sized bed in the master suite and soothe your tired muscles in the two-person shower or jet tub.With all sorts of mountain activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking, and many more, your adventure options are endless year-round. Walking distance from the Snowflake Lift and 4 O’clock Ski Run, you’re only steps away from perhaps the best skiing in the world. The Cawha Chalet is a beautiful luxury home that is a must-see and a must-book! Whether you are bringing the family, coming for a work retreat or just enjoying the lap of luxury with friends, this Colorado chalet is sure to provide the dream mountain holiday you always wanted.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in magazine-worthy interiors in a postcard-worthy setting at YO Villa. Set in the exclusive Plai Laem area, this Koh Samui vacation rental commands views of neighboring islands and the cerulean sea. Its beautifully appointed rooms and four bedrooms are complemented by a full staff, offering luxury accommodations for up to eight.Your holiday at YO includes the services of a chef, villa manager and housekeeper. After arriving by complimentary airport transfer and sipping a cold welcome drink, you’ll be free to relax on a terrace with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining area. Other amenities range from a home theater and private gym to a wine fridge and Wi-Fi.Fold-away glass walls lead from the terrace to a U-shaped great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Sleek furnishings set a contemporary tone, from chrome-legged chairs and a clean-lined sectional to more playful pieces like a sheep sculpture. For your comfort, the villa is fully air conditioned.YO Villa’s four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family members. Each one is as well appointed as a room at a resort, with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, TV and air conditioning. Streamlined furnishings in plush fabrics lend each suite a luxe feel, while plenty of stone gives spa-worthy appeal to the bathrooms.Thanks to the provided kayaks and beachfront location, you can be out on the water in minutes. The villa is also a 5-minute walk or less from stunning Samrong Bay Beach and Malati Beach, where you can swim, take a honeymoon-worthy stroll or stop for a drink at a laid-back bar close to the sand. With temples, an elephant sanctuary, and shopping and dining in Fisherman’s Village 10 minutes or less by car, it’s easy to get a feel for local culture.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the heart of one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Breckenridge is Highwoods at Shockhill. Part of the Shock Hill Landing development, luxury, comfort and convenience will draw you to this exceptional, newly constructed property. Warmer months provide stellar golf and hiking opportunities in Colorado, while the winters bring skis, snowboards and rosy cheeks. Keep on the lookout for lovely birds or the fleeting glimpse of a fox darting into the woods as you navigate the incredible natural scenery around you!The spacious open layout of the main floor is the perfect place to entertain or just relax and watch television, read a book or listen to music on the surround sound system. The incredible views from the deck invite you to take it easy on the patio chairs or fire up some steaks on the gas grill. After the day’s activities, entertainment for children can be found in the den with games to play or movies to watch from the 200+ film library. Step onto the patio and sit under the stars while you soak in the hot tub or warm up around the fire pit.Built with native natural accents, reclaimed wood floors and high end amenities, this private vacation rental provides everything you need for a wonderful alpine holiday. The fully-stocked gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and an eat-in counter. High ceilings and huge windows allow much natural sunlight to enter the home throughout the day.Four exquisite bedrooms and some additional bedding accommodate up to twelve guests at this holiday chalet. With a master king suite, two king bedroom suites, a bunk bedroom and a sleeper sofa, there is something for everyone in your group. Highwoods at Shockhill makes a great bet for a family vacation or an unforgettable alpine honeymoon.Only steps from the Gondola Mid-Station, guests will have quick access to the ski slopes as well as the dining, shopping and nightlife of Main Street. If it is Nordic skiing or hiking you desire, endless trails are right outside your front door. In the fall, the Breckenridge Oktoberfest sprawls into Main Street and welcomes live music, dancing and food for a cultural experience during your stay. Get the mountain sojourn you have earned with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Little could be more invigorating than beach fun and tennis on the sunny island of Anguilla. Zenaida Estate offers both brilliant activities right at your fingertips! This resplendent villa is located in the coveted area of Sandy Hill and is nestled on three acres of lush tropical gardens with sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea and the mountains of St. Martin and St. Barths. Come get the rest and relaxation you deserve at this bijou villa!Zenaida Beach and Tennis Estate comprises three pavilions – ‘Flamboyant,’ ‘Loblolly’ and ‘Garden Cottage.’ Enjoy a swim in the infinity pool overlooking the aquamarine and azure hues of the ocean. Zenaida Estate also offers the only Har-Tru soft tennis court in the Leeward Islands. The court is well lit for playing in the cool of the tropical nights. The pièce de résistance of Zenaida, however, is no doubt the mile stretch of Anguilla’s famous powder-white sand beach right in your backyard. When you step out of the ocean, an open air hot tub and a delightful BBQ area await your whims. Perhaps some alfresco dining tonight?Asian antiques and chic contemporary furniture populate the interior spaces of Zenaida. The main living area features double-story ceilings and generous openings to the sea view. The gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a center island with a breakfast bar. Your reservation at Zenaida Estate includes a full staff with housekeeping, manager and security as well as complimentary continental breakfasts.Seven immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Zenaida Estate. All of the bedrooms feature king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Fine linens and comfortable beddings provide splendid nights of rest. Wake up to crystal clear mornings and nothing but the sounds of ocean waves as your soundtrack!With over 30 beaches, gourmet beachfront restaurants, a relaxed lifestyle and friendly people, Anguilla has become a renowned destination for the sophisticated traveler. Scuba diving, deep-sea fishing, wind surfing, sailing, horseback riding and world class spa facilities are all available within a few minutes of Zenaida Estate. Perfect for families, groups of friends or corporate retreats, come experience the laid back island tempo and warm hospitality that have made this area of the Caribbean so desirable.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Even if you don’t have much of a sweet tooth, you’ll find yourself craving a stay at Beach Kandi. Set on the sugary sands of Grace Bay Beach, the two-bedroom villa is close to perfect snorkeling reefs, the dining and sightseeing of Turtle Cove Marina and golf and tennis. Its breezy interiors and panoramic ocean views make it a treat indeed.The villa opens to a spacious terrace with an inviting sitting area, lounge chairs and an infinity pool. You’re close enough to the beach that the villa’s pair of daybeds are right on the sand. After a day of snorkeling or sunbathing, rinse off in the outdoor shower and try cooking local seafood on the barbecue. In the evenings, switch on the sound system or share updates via Wi-Fi and sleep comfortably in the air conditioning.A fold-away glass wall turns the open-plan great room of Beach Kandi into a breezy indoor-outdoor living space. Recline on the sitting area’s gray sofas, set a drink on the live-edge wood coffee table and watch the waves outside or the pop-up television. The wood textures are echoed by the dining table and chairs, which have room for six, as well as the polished wood ceiling. The bright, fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and sleek European cabinets.The villa’s two bedrooms are set one above the other at the front of the house for spectacular water views. Each has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub and walk-in closet; the upstairs bedroom has a private balcony while the downstairs suite opens to the pool terrace. The bedrooms are modern and stylish, with wood ceilings, white walls and creamy marble floors, but the showstopper in each is the ceiling-mounted tub filler.Plan to fly into Providenciales International Airport, just under 4 miles (or about a 10-minute drive) from the villa. Once you’re at Beach Kandi, you may not need to put your shoes on for the rest of your stay, thanks to its location right on Grace Bay Beach. But if you’d like to see more of the island, it’s a 10-minute walk to Turtle Cove Marina, 4 miles to the reefs at Princess Alexandra National Park and 7 miles to historic Cheshire Hall. Work on your swing at Turks & Caicos Islands Tennis Club, 2 miles away, or a different kind of swing at at Provo Golf Club, 6 miles away.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The views sweep from the Hollywood sign across downtown L.A. to the Pacific at the breathtakingly modern Beech Knoll. Featured in several magazines and on the AWE television network, this stunning three-bedroom vacation rental is just as memorable for its interiors as for its surroundings. Use this West Hollywood Hills luxury villa as a stylish private getaway, or as a base to shop, dine and sightsee on a holiday in greater Los Angeles.Recently renovated by a tech entrepreneur, Beech Knoll has an array of thoughtful smart-home touches, from touch-screen panels for entertainment and lighting and a house-wide sound system to window shades that can automatically lower in strong sunlight. Start your day with a cup just the way you like it from the espresso machine, and end the evening with a glass from the wine fridge, sipped by the gas fireplace. Take in the panoramic views and enjoy the California sun from multiple balconies set with inviting lounge furniture.The villa’s bright, modern interiors have landed it features on the Curbed real estate blog and in the Robb Report, a spot on Dwell magazine’s L.A. house tour, and a segment on AWE television’s Behind the Gates. Not only do large windows on all three levels of the house showcase the incredible views, but sliding glass walls let you open the indoor living spaces to the outdoor ones. Though the open-plan living and dining room and fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen are clean-lined and sleek, reclaimed wood and contemporary art are warm touches of texture and whimsical personality.The master bedroom at Beech Knoll has features worthy of a honeymoon suite, from a king bed and stand-alone bathtub overlooking the city to an en-suite bathroom, private balcony and steam room. The other two bedrooms have queen beds and open to balconies; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other shares access to a hall bathroom.Set on a quiet road just off the Sunset Strip, Beech Knoll offers both privacy and convenience. Guests are just a short drive from shopping on Rodeo Drive and at The Grove, concerts at the iconic Hollywood Bowl, the challenging Wilson & Harding Golf Course and the one-of-a-kind art collection at the Getty Center. Take a beach day in Santa Monica, Venice Beach or Malibu. If you’re traveling with family, the younger set will love a day trip to nearby Universal Studios or Disneyland.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Down the long driveway lined with coral stone walls and flamboyant, you arrive in the courtyard of this elegant Creole style villa. It is a quiet, private oasis that sets the stage for relaxing outdoor living and a lush tropical view that begins the moment you enter the villa. The large turquoise pool, accented with a visually pleasing sculpture, draws your eye straight to the stately palms and beyond to the cerulean sea.There is a beautiful flow to the house; an almost seamless connection inside to outside. Although very open, it is private. Large covered galleries create multiple options for dining, lounging and sunning. It also creates a cool space for firing up the barbeque. Sleek, yet comfortable, new loungers surround the pool.The décor is serene and tasteful, both inside and outside. The open plan interior living area contains comfortable oversized seating and inside dining. Adjacent to the main living area is the well-equipped, modern kitchen in sleek white, steel and black. All the interior living spaces open to the terrace and the view. The décor is eclectic, contemporary and relaxed in white, beige and taupe accented with driftwood and dark woods. Beautiful paintings, sculpture and exotic African art adds a very distinctive designer touch to the space.Four bedrooms are set off the pool terrace. The décor is in the mood of a luxe boutique hotel; elegant and serene, each room in a different, yet connective, rich neutral color palette; taupe, cream, charcoal, driftwood and metallic. The en suite bathrooms are works of art with travertine tiles, dark stone, marble countertops, sculpted sinks and beautiful fixtures. Several bathrooms overlook the gardens; one overlooks the sea. For larger gatherings, the sister villa, La Nina, shares the same lot and provides an additional two bedrooms. The two also share a tennis court.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. It’s a short drive to beaches such as Plum Bay and Long Bay. You are ten minutes to the airport. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Ten minutes up the coast from Tulum, you’ll find the white sand and crystal clear waters of Tankah Beach. And, right on Tankah Beach, you’ll find Villa Amara. This five bedroom luxury rental is perfect for a family vacation. With the beach, the ocean, and the beautiful Caribbean sunrise just steps away from your living room couch, you simply can’t go wrong with Villa Amara.Designed to embrace its natural surroundings, this vacation rental has a relaxing space to suit every mood. Whether your dining on the terrace, having a morning coffee at the breakfast bar, or lounging on the rooftop patio, the ocean view is right there with you. The main floor open concept kitchen/lounge area features large doorways on its front and back walls, ensuring the free flow of fresh ocean breeze. Decorated with custom designed seating, contemporary lighting, and modern high end appliances, it’s easy to appreciate the sophisticated simplicity of Amara’s main floor. Rich wooden accents in the kitchen, a trend that will continue in the five luxurious bedrooms, add a touch of warmth to the ocean inspired atmosphere. And, all of those bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms.Some of Amara’s other features inside include, television, a sound system, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and formal dining for ten. On the terrace there are both covered and open living areas with sun loungers, all surrounding the refreshing swimming pool. Before you head to the private beachfront, grab the supplied snorkelling equipment and do some underwater exploration. At meal time, have no worries, this villa comes with three prepared meals and housekeeping everyday.All within a twenty minute drive of Amara’s beachfront property, you’ll find tennis, golf, historical sights, natural wonders, and the restaurants and shops of Tulum. A great, and close, place to start your sight seeing is Casa Cenote. A deep cave that starts just before Tankah Beach and emerges twenty yards off the beach, in the ocean, as an ‘underwater’ water spring. It’s an amazing natural phenomenon.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Luxurious Tree Villa, located in the heart of Camps Bay, can be your very own mansion in Cape Town. Its prominent location provides unobstructed views across one of South Africa’s best beaches and the Twelve Apostles mountain range. Recently renovated without losing the character of a classic Camps Bay property, it also benefits from a large pool and sheltered terrace to help you enjoy the Cape’s sun-kissed days and temperate evenings.As soon as you encounter Tree Villa you get a sense of space and grandeur. Nestling between the jagged peaks of the Apostles and the rooftops of Camps Bay this is a villa with plenty of character and total privacy. Two floors of ocean-facing windows look directly out to sea, a traditional garden teems with plants and birdsong and the azure pool glistens in the sunlight. Less than 15 minutes away you’ll find shops, bars and restaurants and Camps Bay’s famous white sands and surf.Tree Villa is a well- established Camps Bay holiday home that makes superb use of its hillside location. From the impressive fresh white exterior with its curved balconies to the airy living room with breath-taking panoramic ocean views this is a dwelling on a grand scale. The large, fully-equipped kitchen, dining areas set against the backdrop of the Atlantic Ocean and wood-fuelled fireplace epitomize the air of luxury. As the sun rises it’s hard to resist the lure of the shimmering pool surrounded by relaxing sun loungers.The villa’s four bright and airy bedrooms are havens of peace, providing an uncluttered and calming environment for a great night’s sleep. The master bedroom features a king-sized bed and leads on to an en-suite bathroom with a shower and tub. It also opens onto a private balcony with spectacular views of the Cape coastline. Interconnecting with a second bedroom this makes it the ideal suite for a young family. The remaining bedrooms are both en-suite and boast their own private balcony or patio, giving you even more space and breathing room.Here, perched high above Camps Bay, you can have lofty aspirations of an outstanding vacation in Cape Town. The surf and white sands of Camps Bay will lure you to enjoy lazy days on the beach and the boutique shops and cafes are equally attractive. Cape Town’s attractions are also very close. Looming large on the horizon is Table Mountain, a must-see icon whether shrouded in misty cloud or bathed in sunlight.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a haven of modern luxury in the dramatic Arizona landscape at Oasis Estate. Set in the shadows of the McDonald Mountains and Pinnacle Peaks in North Scottsdale, this gated vacation rental is a private enclave of resort-worthy amenities and charming interiors. Its five bedrooms, including one suite in a guest house, are the right size for a golf getaway with friends or a warm-weather birthday or anniversary celebration with the extended family.You’ll want to spend most of your holiday in the villa’s incredible backyard, which features an infinity pool, hot tub, sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, a fireplace and firepit, sound system and, for sportier guests, a volleyball court, ping-pong table and putting green. If you’d like to entertain indoors, a projector screen, Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi make it easy.With details ranging from carved wooden doors and exposed beams to ornate fireplaces and chandeliers, Oasis Estate blends Southwestern style and European elegance. The rooms radiate out from a central sitting area with a fireplace: a formal dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook, and a media room.There are four bedrooms in the estate’s main house and one in a guest house that’s ideal for a couple seeking honeymoon-style privacy or in-laws wanting a little more quiet. The main-house master suite has a king bed, queen bed and two en-suite bathrooms; a second bedroom has two queen beds and an en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a twin-over-double bunk bed and two queen beds, respectively, and share a bathroom, while the guest house has a king bed and en-suite bathroom.From Oasis Estate, it’s a 5-minute drive to Pinnacle Peak Park and less than a 10-mile drive to two golf courses and the Tom’s Thumb trailhead. You’ll find plenty of other golf courses and spas within easy reach, as well as shopping and dining in downtown Scottsdale.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: World-class golf and shopping, unforgettable performances at the Coachella festival or on the Empire Polo Grounds, the otherworldly scenery of Joshua Tree National Park: they’re all at the doorstep of Mirador. Whether you’re coming to Indio for a special occasion, an event or just a little California sunshine, this luxury vacation rental is a private oasis in the Desert Cities.Spend the day on the fairways or festival grounds, then return to cool off in the pool or have a nap on one of the loungers on the terrace. Heat up the barbecue and serve dinner at the outdoor table, then watch the stars come out from around the firepit or in the private hot tub. If you’d prefer to unwind or entertain indoors, there’s a games room with vintage and modern options, a surround sound system and Wi-Fi.From its charming Mediterranean-style facade to its inviting contemporary interiors, Mirador packs a serious style punch. The heart of the villa is an open-plan great room with a sitting area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen. Details such as a geometric rug, shag-topped footstools, a globe chandelier and a wall of white subway tile give the space a fresh yet welcoming feel.The villa’s five bedrooms—four in the main house and one in a casita—can accommodate up to ten friends or extended family on holiday together. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with a queen and two double beds, respectively, with hall bathrooms. With its king bed, en-suite bathroom and direct terrace access, the casita could double as a honeymoon-style retreat.Mirador is a 10-minute drive or less from three golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, and shopping and dining in both downtown Indio and Old Town La Quinta. Drive a bit farther and you’ll come to the Indian Wells Tennis Garden, home to the BNP Paribas Open, and several more golf courses. For a memorable day trip, explore the mid-century architecture of Palm Springs or the totally natural (and often stark) scenery of Joshua Tree National Park.City ID # 19-00021223Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to a unique private sanctuary in a coveted location at Flat Iron Retreat. This gorgeous contemporary home has one-of-a-kind luxury amenities, more than 6,000 square feet of living space that can accommodate up to ten friends or family members. Plus, its setting in The Colony at Park City puts you in an exclusive location close to the Flat Iron ski lift at Park City Mountain Resort.The estate impresses both outside and in with a furnished deck featuring a barbecue, firepit and hot tub. Inside, let the glass elevator whisk you between the great room and a lower-level entertaining area, where you’ll find a lounge with a bar and pool table, an inviting home theater and an indoor sports court that can be used for basketball, racquetball and “wallyball” (a fast-paced game similar to volleyball that will quickly become part of your happy holiday memories).Sleek contemporary interiors also set this vacation rental apart. A wall of windows, sloped ceiling and open-concept layout lend the upper-level great room a bright, welcoming feel. The furnishings make it easy to relax: cozy up to the stone fireplace in a trendy ikat-print chair, sip a drink on one of the barstools facing the fireplace and TV, or relive the day’s adventures around the dining table. Custom cabinets, marble counters and state-of-the-art appliances mean the fully equipped kitchen is both stylish and functional.Flat Iron Retreat has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, walk-in closet and mountain views, and a kids’ room with three queen bunk beds and its own lounge area. A guest room has a queen Murphy bed and access to a bathroom off the home theatre.If the amenities weren’t enough, ski-in, ski-out access to the Flat Iron ski run for intermediate and advanced skiers makes the honeymoon from real life complete. It’s also a short drive to the Canyons lifts, the Park City Mountain Resort base and historic Main Street in downtown Park City. Be sure to take a day trip to Utah Olympic Park, where you can tour the facilities and even try a bobsled run yourself.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to classic French Riviera charm—with a contemporary twist—at La Calado. Pretty and traditional on the outside, chic and modern on the inside, this Antibes vacation rental is a wonderfully stylish retreat. At five bedrooms and a short distance from downtown, it’s the perfect size for reconnecting with family and the perfect spot for exploring the area with friends.Private gardens filled with cypress and olive trees, lavender and rosemary bring a little piece of the French countryside to the villa’s quiet neighborhood just minutes from Antibes. Savor the scents and sunshine from terraces with a heated pool and lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, flip on the Apple TV, surround-sound system and Wi-Fi, or treat yourself to a session in the hammam or a glass from the wine cellar.While the original villa is a Belle Epoque gem, this luxury property has been lovingly restored to a bright, modern finish. Parquet floors, pale wood accents and white walls link the living room and dining room, and doors lead into a fully equipped kitchen with a stunning waterfall marble breakfast bar.Each of the five bedrooms at La Calado has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, as well as the same considered style as the main living areas. Details such as exposed ceiling beams and cozy window seats lend charm, while in the bathrooms, patterned tile has spa-worthy appeal.Spend your holiday ensconced in the villa or sightseeing around the Riviera. It’s a short drive from the residence to shopping, dining and ancient fortifications in the old town area of Antibes, and to popular, sandy Salis Beach. Relive your honeymoon over a drink at the exclusive Hotel du Cap-Eden Rock or make the short drive to Cannes for a stroll along the famous Croisette.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This custom-designed home is one of our most unique Barbados villa rentals—it’s shaped like a crescent, allowing you to see panoramic sea views from every room. With a perfect climate, stretches of amazing beaches and a unique culture, the island of Barbados offers visitors a memorable tropical getaway.Indulge in the quiet serenity of the manicured back gardens that feature a fountain and swaying palm trees, or lounge on the pool deck on one of the cushioned chaises surrounded by stunning sea views. The large infinity-edge pool seems to almost blend into the turquoise waters of the sea ahead.Inside, this estate boasts an open-air concept and views of the sea, and it is tastefully decorated with soft furnishings, marble floors and calming, neutral tones with pops of colour. The living room features cozy seating, high ceilings, and access to a large patio overlooking the garden and pool. A dining room offers soaring ceilings, a table with seating for up to eight, large doors with sea views and a small tropical garden. Meanwhile, the bright kitchen is fully equipped with Miele appliances and has French doors leading out to the back garden.The home allows up to eight guests, and has four bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and sea views. The master bedroom on the northern tip of the home features vaulted ceilings, a soaking tub and a private terrace through double French doors. Two other bedrooms are in the same wing, one being able to connect with the master, and the final, queen-sized bedroom is found on the far end of the home.From here, you’ll be close to Holetown’s high-end shopping mall as well as some of the island’s top restaurants, and museum hopping can be done in the historic Speightstown, only a 10-minute drive away. Don’t forget to take in plenty of beach time—Sandy Lane beach is just 4.8 km from the property.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in the heart of Steamboat Springs at Ambassadors Penthouse 403. This beautiful Colorado vacation rental in the Olympian complex is just minutes from shopping, dining and the town’s namesake hot springs. In the winter, a complimentary shuttle whisks guests to Steamboat Ski Resort. Book this modern, open-plan property for a laid-back vacation with family or a ski getaway with friends.The penthouse opens to a private wraparound deck with views of the Yampa River, Howelsen Hill and Emerald Mountain. There are al-fresco sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and a hot tub big enough for six—plus a built-in heating system that keeps snow off the deck. Inside, a wet bar, wine cooler and espresso machine make entertaining a breeze, while a fireplace, flat-screen television and Wi-Fi make for cozy, quieter nights in.The views are just as impressive through the floor-to-ceiling windows in the great room, too. The open-plan space has room for everyone to gather and enjoy each other’s company, whether on the sectional in front of the fireplace or in the soft leather chairs around the dining table. Custom cabinets and granite countertops make the fully equipped kitchen both beautiful and practical, and a breakfast bar is convenient for both morning espressos and après-ski snacks.The three bedrooms at this luxury villa continue the spacious, modern ambience. A master suite with a king bed and an en-suite bathroom couldn’t be more welcoming after a day on the slopes or the golf course. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a bathroom—the perfect setup for parents and younger kids on holiday together.Known for its challenging ski runs and lively nightlife, Steamboat Springs also has plenty of outdoor adventure, from fishing and kayaking to rafting, golf and hiking. At the end of a day out in the mountain air, soak tired muscles in the family-friendly Old Town hot springs, a 5-minute walk from the villa, or enjoy a romantic evening in the honeymoon-worthy natural pools at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Originally built in 1929 and renovated with exquisite vision and care, Villa Royale exudes the glamor of Old Hollywood and the artful chic of contemporary Los Angeles. Situated within minutes of Rodeo Drive, the cloistered Beverly Hills estate features breathtaking interiors and ample alfresco living and dining areas. A four- bedroom main house and one-bedroom guesthouse accommodate ten guests in all, forming an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends.The villa's exterior offers ample space for cocktail parties or relaxation with loved-ones under the Southern California sky, its lush hedges and trees blending gentle shade into the delicious sunlight. A stone path crosses the lawn from the villa to the terrace, where you can sunbathe on elegant loungers, steep yourself in the hot tub, and plunge into the soothing pool. Between the guesthouse and main house are an alfresco dining patio and lounge with fire pit. Beautiful details like the lantern descending over the dining table, the lozenge-formed ivy, and the mosaic tile on the hot tub's podium enhance the yard's enchantment.Indoors, each living area and bedroom is a work of art unto itself. Folding doors invite an alfresco ambiance into the stunning main living room with fireplace and fuchsia armchairs. A luminous, high-end kitchen and adjoining dining room with zebra floors open to the patio and pool terrace. A parlor with hearth, sumptuous banquette seating, and elegant bar welcomes after-dinner cocktails.The villa's fabulous bedrooms include a king suite, three queen suites (including one in the guest house), and a charming kids' room with treehouse-style bunk bed. All enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master suite features a quartet of crystal chandeliers and a royal armchair, while its bathroom includes a deep soaking tub.From the villa's ample motor court, you're an easy drive to countless Los Angeles attractions, from the nearby Grove and Hollywood Bowl, to the galleries of the Getty, to the fairways of Wilson & Harding Golf Course. Proximity to LAX and Bob Hope makes Villa Royale an excellent choice for destination wedding guests and easy weekend getaways.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ensconce yourself in modern luxury in the heart of London at Royalty Mews Penthouse. Thanks to its Soho location, this contemporary vacation rental puts the city's shopping, dining, historic sites and cultural attractions at your doorstep. Reserve its three bedrooms for an urban getaway with friends, a sightseeing holiday with family or even an active honeymoon in the thick of it all.Start each day with a coffee from the espresso machine, sipped at the al-fresco dining area on the villa's private terrace, or finish the evening with a glass of wine under the stars. A TV and sound system will help you unwind, Wi-Fi makes it easy to keep in touch, and both heating and air conditioning ensure your comfort no matter what the season-or the English weather.Thoughtfully designed and beautifully appointed, the penthouse embodies the best of sleek, modern British style. A nearly wall-to-wall sliding door floods the living room with light, while sculptural furniture is both lovely to look at and comfortable to sit in. A breakfast bar is an inviting focal point in the fully equipped kitchen, and there's also a dining table for four.Each of the three bedrooms at Royalty Mews Penthouse has a King bed; two of them have en-suite bathrooms and the third has shared access to a hall bathroom. Neutral tones give the bedrooms a serene ambience, and in the bathrooms, stone panels and on-trend brass-toned fixtures lend a spa-worthy appeal.During your stay, sample the Soho shopping and dining just outside the villa or take advantage of the location to walk to Piccadilly Circus, Trafalgar Square and Covent Garden to sightsee. The property is a 20-minute drive or less from sights such as Westminster Abbey, the London Eye, St. Paul's Cathedral, Buckingham Palace and the tower that houses Big Ben, so it's easy to tick off everything on your must-see list.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Walk past a gently flowing fountain and a pair of lion statues (said to bring peace and prosperity) to reach the front door of this desert oasis. Upon entering, you’ll find an open-concept living area and formal dining room with antique chairs and a rustic wooden table. Located in the prosperous North Scottsdale neighborhood, you’re close to fine dining, elegant wine bars, and luxury boutiques. Plush furniture, brass chandeliers, and artful accents stand out against a smooth, white colour scheme. Sliding glass doors open up to let the expansive blue skies drench the interior in natural light. Set the alfresco table and dine with your whole crew on the sheltered terrace. A spiral staircase leads to the rooftop lounge—perfect place to stretch out and admire the dramatic sunset over the panoramic vista. Verdant, manicured lawn, sprinkled with desert shrubbery, encompasses the turquoise swimming pool. Feel the tranquility of the property as you walk along rust-hued stones through the pebbled landscaping. Why not end the evening with a soak under the stars in your private azure-tiled hot tub?Nearby Mcdowell Mountain Park is a popular spot for hiking, biking and horseback riding. Your pick of golf clubs are within driving distance, as well as the Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club, Echo Canyon Recreation Area, and Paradise Valley Country Club—there’s no excuse not to stay active. Complete your outing with a stop at a local brewery or quaint café to discover a new favourite, refreshing beverage. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sunset views without and warm teak within give Samsara a golden glow. Set above the ocean in the Pointe Milou area of St. Barts, this west-facing contemporary vacation rental makes the most of its location with welcoming indoor-outdoor living areas. Two suite-style bedrooms are the perfect alternative to a resort for couples on holiday together or a relaxed tropical honeymoon.The calm expanse of Lorient Bay stretches out beneath this oceanfront luxury property. Folding walls open the front of the house to a spacious deck, where an infinity pool and row of loungers invite you to take in the views at your leisure. As the sun sinks toward the water, heat up the barbecue, set the mood with the sound system and sit down to dinner with the brilliant sky as your backdrop.Inspired by traditional Balinese villas, the interiors of Samsara use warm-hued Java teak for a welcoming feel. Not only does the influence show up in the great room’s beamed ceilings and polished floors, it’s also in the sitting area’s low, spacious sectional and carved accent pieces. A yellow feature wall is a playful pop of color that’s matched by the sofa cushions. The adjacent dining area isn’t quite outside, but gets a definite al-fresco feel from the fold-back walls, and in the fully equipped kitchen, beautiful granite counters draw their rich blue tones from the sea outside.Both bedrooms at Samsara have a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views, so it’s not hard to choose between the two. The only differences: one opens to a private terrace with lounge furniture, and the other opens to a tucked-away outdoor shower.Both a hotspot for the glamorous set and a favorite with celebrities on family vacation, St. Barts is at once chic and laid-back. A stay at Samsara lets you see both sides, with three gorgeous beaches a short drive away boasting the island’s famous white sands and clear waters, as well as the Colombier Beach Trail. A 7.1 km drive will bring you to excellent restaurants and lively nightlife, and a 20-minute drive puts you in the center of the designer boutiques of downtown Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Thanksgiving 2019 promotion available for 3 or 4 bedroom bookings. Includes daily breakfast & housekeeping, roundtrip transfer from St. Maarten, Thanksgiving dinner at villa and car rental cost of up to $300 (insurance and license not included). Must book between now and November 19th, 2019.Located on spectacular Shoal Bay East in the idyllic island paradise of Anguilla, Villa Black Pearl offers privacy, relaxed elegance and exquisite views. Just steps to one of the Caribbean’s most beautiful beaches, you will be perfectly positioned for the ultimate Caribbean holiday. Allow the vibrant colors and divine serenity of this magical spot to melt your cares away.This tropical villa features a unique Mediterranean design including a domed roof and a barrel roof, as well as verandahs and pergolas throughout, allowing you to enjoy indoor/outdoor living to its fullest. While relaxing in any one of these areas, you will find solitude combined with a stunning panorama. The large outdoor living area is an ideal spot to toast the magnificent sunset, listen to the sounds of the sea and perhaps share a special announcement with your loved ones or entourage. During the day, laze about with the flotation devices in the heated swimming pool. From a gas grill, to alfresco showers and a roof deck bar with a gazebo, Villa Black Pearl aims to make this trip to Anguilla one for the books!The indoor spaces at Villa Black Pearl are large and airy with ceiling fans and custom furniture fabricated in Thailand. Natural shell stone floors, rich kabukali and cherry woods and natural Anguilla stone walls contribute to the palatial and modern feelings embodied by the design and decor of this fabulous villa. Top-of-the-line fixtures and the finest amenities round out this villa’s chic Caribbean style.Four exquisite and stately bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Villa Black Pearl. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and media centers. You will find a variety of sleeping arrangements for everyone in the family. Your reservation includes housekeeping and a villa manager who will do everything to make your stay comfortable and carefree.An oasis of privacy and serenity right next to the luminous white sands of Shoal Bay Beach along a manicured seaside path – what more could you ask for this vacation? Just a short walk from some excellent restaurants and minutes from town and golf, when the day comes to pack your bags, you will wonder where all the time went. This feeling has made Villa Black Pearl a popular repeat destination for our distinguished guests. Your vacation, your way!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sun, sand and sea of the Riviera Maya are all at the doorstep of Hacienda Del Mar. Even better, this beachfront vacation rental has an attentive staff, luxury amenities and fifteen bedrooms for up to thirty-five guests, both in the main house and in two casitas. Reserve this beautifully appointed property for a family reunion, birthday or anniversary celebration, or a sun-kissed destination wedding for up to 250 guests along with the two additional sister haciendas.Your stay at the hacienda includes the services of a gourmet chef for three meals each day, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as welcome refreshments and bottled drinking water. (If you’ll be staying over the winter holidays, even more is included.) The villa features its own heated pool, an outdoor sound system, and al-fresco living and dining areas facing the beach, plus a games room, bar, satellite television and Wi-Fi.Sliding glass doors connect the villa’s open-concept great room to its beachfront outdoor living areas.There are seven bedrooms in the villa’s main house and four bedrooms in each of its two casitas. In the main house, there are five bedrooms with king beds and two with two twin beds each. Both casitas have two bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All of the casita bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.The oceanfront location of Hacienda Del Mar puts you right on Fatima Bay Beach, a 5-minute walk from the Puerto Aventuras Golf and Tennis Club, and a 10-minute drive from Xpu-Ha Beach and downtown Playa del Carmen. Be sure to leave time for a day trip to the ruins of Tulum, a 30-minute drive away, and Tulum itself, an increasingly popular honeymoon and getaway destination.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Read our insider guide to Hacienda Del Mar in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/05/vacation-diary-riviera-maya-mexico/)

listing.listing_description: Step into the tropical embrace of Bali’s southern coast with this premium villa close to Batu Bolong beach. Step out onto the airy terrace to take in views of the nearby rice fields, before diving into the vivid pool. From the sun recliners, take in the bold, vertical design of the home, before relaxing in the plush and ornate interiors, with the beaches of Canggu just minutes away.Richness is the defining word for Villa Kayajiwa, which guests awakening to a villa that is both ideally located, and decorated to an exceptional degree. The royal themes that run through the regal-feeling sitting room and passages of the home are punctuated by the vibrant green flash of tropical plants and hanging trees, helping to bring guests more in touch with the island’s wilderness. Rich, wooden panelling dominates the home, while the shaded outdoor areas are both private and indulgently comfortable, with no expense spared in outfitting and style. Wander ornate stone pathways, or luxuriate amidst the leather and jade tiling of the impressive bathrooms. With a fantastic choice of group dining spaces, the fun-loving lights and relaxed vibe of the villa’s karaoke room is a favorite with guests.With its proximity to the fabled beaches of Bali, Villa Kayajia makes a fantastic choice for those looking to both relax in fine surroundings and make the most of some of the finest beaches in this part of the world. Guests can simply take a 5 minute walk to Batu Bolong Beach, which offers open sands, stunning sun and great surroundings. The surfer’s mecca that is Echo Beach is similarly a short walk away. The buzzing restaurants and bars of the beach district offer a huge number of chill-out and relaxation spots, while the distinct heritage of the area is best typified via nearby sites like Tanah Lot, a Hindu temple suspended on a rocky outcrop surrounded by crashing blue waves.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a Bahamas hideaway that will make you believe in magic at Unicorn Cay. This one-of-a-kind vacation rental was built by Rosita Forbes, a famed writer and explorer who traveled widely throughout north Africa and the Middle East before settling on Eleuthera Island. The four-bedroom house was inspired by a French chateau and commands 12 acres of private grounds and nearly 500 feet of pink-sand beach. And today, it welcomes not just adventurers, but those looking to unwind and reconnect with friends and family.Take in the views from the shaded verandas and patios lining the house, or relax in the sunny central courtyard on a lounger or sun bed by the pool. There’s a barbecue where you can prep local specialties and an al-fresco dining table where you can enjoy them. Kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and snorkel equipment are provided for your use, and the villa has a golf cart you can take to the Unicorn Cay beach. In the evening, entertain inside around the hand-crafted walnut bar, spend a quiet moment in the library or keep up with favorite shows or games on the satellite TV.A gated entrance flanked by turrets sets the stately, European-inspired tone for this grande dame of Caribbean estates. It was recently restored to bring out the original features, from Abaco pine floors and woodwork to native stone, and add a touch of modern luxury—think gourmet appliances in the fully equipped kitchen. In the living and dining areas, built-in bookcases, coffered ceilings and a broad fireplace continue the feel of inviting elegance.Each of the property’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and opens onto the courtyard. There is one master suite with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The beautiful traditional interiors, which include details like four-poster beds and ornate chests, give the feeling of staying in someone’s country estate on holiday.The villa’s charms extend to its 470 feet of pink-sand beach, perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll or snorkeling on the nearby reefs. Its location near Governor’s Harbour is close to several fine restaurants, as well as the Edwin’s Turtle Lake Marine Preserve. For an easy day trip, drive to the ferry docks and ride over to Harbour Island for a few hours of exploration.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Clémentine villa is located on the hillside of Vitet, overlooking Lorient Bay while offering a wide view towards Saint Martin. The island of Saint Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape is composed of beautiful hills and ravines. With a distinct French influence, the island is sophisticated, yet laid back. The people of St. Barts take great pride in providing comfort, quiet and security to their visitors. Enjoy this escape with Luxury Retreats!The grounds of this stunning vacation rental feature a swimming pool flanked by padded sun loungers and palm trees swaying in the wind. Climb the stairs to the covered alfresco dining area and lounge. There’s also a second outdoor lounge with a hanging chair and a sun bed. Inside this private holiday home, you will find a Nespresso machine, ice maker, Wi-Fi, desk and satellite television. There’s also an exercise room to stay on top of your workouts. Your reservation includes housekeeping.The contemporary interiors of Clémentine showcase high ceilings, stylish furnishings and exquisite lighting fixtures. The white and bright open plan space includes a sleek set of couches and a large flat screen television. Behind it, the fully equipped kitchen offers a center island with a long breakfast bar. Two bedrooms include high vaulted ceilings, adding a quintessentially Caribbean motif.In total, three bedrooms with queen size beds and en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom provides a dual vanity, dressing area, lounge, ceiling fan and direct access to terrace and spectacular ocean views. We recommend this villa for a family reunion, a couples’ getaway or a special event like a wedding, birthday or anniversary.Stone fences crisscross the steep slopes of Morne du Vitet, one of many mountains on St. Barts, along a rocky shore that resembles the rugged coast of Normandy. There is plenty of opportunity for fun and adventure, from volleyball to tennis and water skiing. In Gustavia, St. Barts’ tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over the course of a leisurely day. There is a little something for everyone on the tropical paradise of Saint Barts!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tucked between the Caribbean Sea and the jungle, on the verge of picturesque Tankah Bay and tranquil Soliman Bay, is Villa Sofia. This spectacular oceanfront home is one of the newest in the area—just outside Tulum—and features six bedrooms, including one in a casita. The combination of gorgeous location and spacious accommodations makes this vacation rental perfect for a getaway with friends or a relaxed holiday with extended family.The villa’s beachfront living areas feel like your very own luxury resort. Sip refreshments in the shaded sitting areas, go for a swim in the infinity pool, stretch out in the sun on a lounger or perch on one of the swings. As the sun sets, gather under the palapa for a meal at the al-fresco dining table or step inside to unwind around the satellite TV and share photos via Wi-Fi.Spread out over 6,000 square feet, the interiors of Villa Sofia are spacious and bright. At the heart is an L-shaped great room with living and dining areas that open to the terrace and a kitchen with a breakfast bar. Polished tile floors are cool underfoot, cream-colored furniture is paired with wood accents for a sophisticated look, and two sets of sliding doors flood the space with Riviera Maya sunshine.Villa Sofia has five bedrooms in its main house—four with king beds and one with two twin beds—and one bedroom in a casita. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same refined mix of neutral tones and warm wood accents, and many have private terraces with ocean views. With a king bed, sofa bed and kitchenette, the casita could be used as a honeymoon suite or a retreat for the in-laws.While you could spend your stay watching the waves crash on the beach in front of the villa or strolling on the sand, it’s well worth leaving this dreamy property to explore the area. Make the 20-minute drive to Tulum to see the unforgettable Mayan ruins, the 50-minute drive to Playa del Carmen for sun and shopping, or the 55-minute drive to Coba for more incredible archaeological sites.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Brilliant orange blossoms dangle over a daybed on the terrace of this curvy-walled contemporary retreat. The villa’s modern architecture, from its concave glass to its convex pool, echoes the slopes of the lush Bali hills around it. Drive the 6 kilometers over the hills, and you’ll discover the white sands of Pandawa, one of the island’s so-called secret beaches and a beautiful spot for swimming. Untamed forest meets clean lines at the villa’s infinity pool, which lines the edge of a furnished terrace. The outdoor living areas also feature a sound system, barbecue, and a traditional Indonesian bale pavilion, a circle of shade that’s made for reading or napping. Your holiday here includes the services of a butler, housekeeper, and villa manager, as well as daily breakfast. An open-sided great room feels like an extension of the terrace—and has panoramic views over the treetops. The curving sofa fits neatly into the walls of the living area, a dining area in front of the pool seats 10, and the adjacent kitchen is fully equipped. This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with queen beds, en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms afford you the luxury of reliving your honeymoon in private hot tubs, and one has its own balcony too. A short drive over the South Kuta hills will bring you to Pandawa Beach, but you can also head in the opposite direction to reach Jimbaran Beach, where you can try out surfing or indulge in seafood at an oceanfront restaurant. Golfers will appreciate the two courses within a short drive, while those looking for an only-in-Bali experience can visit the nearby Uluwatu Sea Temple to watch the dramatic kecak fire dance. If you’re traveling as a family, take the kids for a day on the slides of Waterbom Bali. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A location close to the number-one beach in the world, eight hours of butler service each day and four suite-style bedrooms: it all adds up to a gorgeous luxury holiday at Turquoise Villa. This beautiful Leeward vacation rental is perfect for parties of up to eight, whether you’re visiting Turks and Caicos for a warm-weather family getaway or a Caribbean escape with a group of friends.Your stay at Turquoise Villa includes housekeeping and butler service for eight hours per day, as well as the assistance of a property manager and on-call concierge. Spend your time soaking in the tropical sun from the loungers on the terrace that stretches around the pool and hot tub or seeking shade in the partially covered outdoor sitting area. Prepare dinner on the barbecue to enjoy at the al-fresco dining area, then finish the evening around the firepit or inside in front of the smart TV.Inside, the villa lives up to its name with chic, open-plan interiors furnished in white with turquoise accents. The living and dining room is flooded with light from a wall of windows and doors opening to the terrace, and the fully equipped kitchen is just as sleek and airy. Set the mood in this contemporary space with the sound system, or post photos of your trip via the home’s Wi-Fi.The property has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a furnished private balcony, one bedroom with a queen bed and twin bunk bed, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.A Leeward location means Turquoise Villa is only 150 feet from the top-ranked white sands and clear waters of Grace Bay Beach. Join the honeymooners and sun-seekers on the shore, or make the short drive to the shops and restaurants along the beach or the pristine Princess Alexandra National Park. Practice your swing at the nearby Provo Golf Club and Tennis Court, or book a fishing excursion from Blue Haven Marina.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed for entertaining in full view of the mountains, Clowsgill Holme is the perfect retreat for a family reunion or fun-filled holiday with friends. This custom log home features spacious yet cozy interiors, plenty of picture windows and finely wrought post and beam construction. Its location on Baldy Mountain is only minutes from skiing, hiking, biking, the quaint town of Breckenridge and more, putting you close to the Colorado outdoors any time of year.After a day on the trails, leave gear in the mudroom and watch the sunset from the villa’s private deck, which has a barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight and a hot tub. If it’s too chilly outside, opt for a snug evening indoors by the glow of the fireplace and flat-screen television.Clowsgill Holme pairs rustic elements with modern furnishings for comfortable yet stylish interiors. Thick wooden beams and a stone fireplace fill the living room with natural texture, while tufted leather sofas are soft and inviting. Both the pedestal table in the formal dining area and the farmhouse-inspired table in the breakfast nook have views of the mountains. And the fully equipped kitchen has both on-trend granite countertops and state-of-the-art appliances.The five bedrooms at this luxury vacation rental can accommodate up to fourteen guests. There are three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, including a plush master suite with its own fireplace and steam shower, and two that share a hall bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms feature weighty wood beams from British Columbia redwoods and floors in warm-toned reclaimed wood.The villa’s perch on Baldy Mountain is only 10 minutes from the nearest ski area and steps from cross-country, hiking and biking trails. Bring the family to Carter Park for sledding and tubing, or your sweetheart to Breckenridge’s historic downtown for a honeymoon-style stroll past shops and restaurants. For warm-weather guests, the Breckenridge Golf Club is just a short drive from Clowsgill Holme.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Let waves lapping at your private beach serve as soundtrack to a blissful holiday at Villa Zacil Na. A wonderful location, attentive staff and thoughtful amenities at this Riviera Maya vacation rental mean that all you need to do is show up and relax. Of course, you can also reserve the property’s sister villa to host a family reunion, anniversary celebration or milestone birthday party for up to eighteen guests.Your stay at Zacil Na includes the services of a chef for three meals each day, villa manager, butler and housekeeper. With a heated infinity pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and even an outdoor sound system, the villa is as well appointed as any resort. There’s also a television, sound system and Wi-Fi inside the house.Wide sliding glass doors lead from the outdoor living areas to an atrium-like great room with a water feature, double-height ceiling and built-in sofas. It’s sleek and stylish but inviting, with plenty of space to stretch out. You can also gather in the dining room or cook beyond the provided chef service in a fully equipped kitchen.There are three bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property: two with king beds and one with two twin beds. The villa also has a separate guest house with two king bedrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy suite with its own entrance. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.It’s easy to explore the bay just in front of Villa Zacil Na thanks to provided snorkeling equipment, kayaks and flotation devices. It’s also easy to explore the area; the villa’s Puerto Aventuras location is only a 2-minute drive from the nearest town and golf course, and a 12-minute drive from the restaurants and nightlife of Playa del Carmen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Silver Star 41 is fabulous luxury villa located within a year-round alpine playground of Park City. Here, you can ski and snowboard to your heart’s content, while other activity options include winter fly-fishing, hot-air ballooning, snowmobiling, sleigh rides and snow tubing. During the warmer months at Park City, options include zip tours, golf, mountain biking, hiking and horseback riding, to name but a few. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!The outdoor perks at this stunning vacation rental include a private hot tub, barbeque and wet bar. This private holiday home has been loaded with perks such as an espresso machine, satellite television, Wi-Fi and an elevator. Guests will enjoy complimentary access to the five-star amenities of the Silver Star Community including a heated swimming pool, a hot tub, exercise room, cafe and fire pits. Your reservation includes light housekeeping and complimentary shared shuttle service during the winter.Contemporary, plush and pastel furnishings in the media room offer some real moments to unwind. The formal dining area is casual and comfortable. If you have any special news to share this year, why not do so over a sumptuous meal? The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. Or perhaps it’s just time to curl up with a fresh drink and a good book by the fireplace in the living room?Four immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and televisions. The master suite offers a king size bed and a dual shower. You will find another king bed in one suite and two queen beds in another. The bunk room is sure to be a hit with children!Whether you have come to Utah to ski or golf, you will find everything you require within close reach of this breathtaking chalet. The Park City Golf Club and plenty of options for nature walks and hiking are within easy reach. In the summer, look for outdoor concerts at the magnificent Snow Park Outdoor Amphitheater. Whether for a family holiday, a couples’ retreat or special events such as a wedding or anniversary, get the alpine getaway you deserve!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern, angular architecture stands out against an endless sky at this laid-back, waterfront property. The resort-style villa is located on the Mornington Peninsula and features glittering water views from each room. Dense shrubbery has been planted along the perimeter to give a natural sense of privacy. Enjoy the fresh ocean air from your private jetty where you can also keep various water toys.The ultra contemporary interior features metallic accents, polished hardwood floors, and expansive glass walls. Floor-to-ceiling white lacquer cabinets create a clean, minimal appearance in the open-concept kitchen. Secure your spot on the patio’s plump wicker couch and bronze under the golden rays. Sliding doors open onto the deck and alfresco dining area, allowing the living space to seamlessly flow together. Safety Beach, in Melbourne’s bayside suburb, is known for its picturesque coves and stretching shorelines. Head out for a scenic drive along the coast, visit a vineyard, peruse local markets, or cycle along a seaside bike trail. Manicured landscaping at Crown Cove provides a verdant backdrop for afternoon happy hour on the tucked away terrace. The cinema room is a great spot to relax with a favourite family film after a long day of exploring—just don’t forget the popcorn. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Built in 1878 and once owned by one of the most powerful families on the island, this beautiful traditional two storey Santorini mansion is located in the heart of the picturesque village of Megalochori. Every aspect of this mansion is unique with heaps of character. Mansion 1878 consists of two spacious self-contained units with a private pool. From the village square, a small winding road leads to the mansion and into the large cobbled private courtyard, complete with pool and surrounded by potted shrubs and trees. A stone stairway leads up to the first floor with large terraces and panoramic views of the village on the horizon. This traditionally styled property sleeps up to 10 and children are welcome.Outside Mansion 1878 the secluded swimming pool is hard to resist. You can also have the use of an electric barbecue (on request) if you’d like to do a bit of outdoor dining. Inside the property there are lots of modern amenities including satellite television and DVD player.The original structure has been sensitively renovated. Restored to its original splendor, retaining the original layout and features, the gracious proportions and weathered building materials tell a real story and create the charm of this property. The well-equipped traditional-style central kitchen leads into the beautifully lit dining room, perfect for leisurely meals with friends and family. Arched doorways on either side of the kitchen allows for an easy flow through the house.The spacious master bedroom is comfortable, bright and airy. A staircase leads to a private landing and second large double bedroom. An attractive bathroom with wood and stone features services both rooms. On the opposite end of the canava is a spacious sleeping area which allows for two double bedrooms with a shared seating and dressing area. The shared extravagant bathroom has a large shower, seating area and large vanity. A few steps away from the attractive pool you will find a separate spacious double room with en-suite shower room.The village, shops and Megalochori Port are all within a short stroll of the property. The nearest beach is at Perivolos 5km away but is worth making the trip if you have transport. Mansion 1878 is only 12 km from the airport so you won’t have to wait long after touching down before you’re transported to a traditional Greek haven.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

feature.p: At the turn of the century, the first floor would have been occupied by the family with the ground floor serving as the winery and cellar. The Vinsanto dessert wine produced was exported to Russia, where it was used by the Russian Orthodox Church for Holy Communion. Unfortunately, this all came to an end with the Russian Revolution which had a big impact on the wealth of families in this once flourishing village.

The original structure has been sensitively renovated. Restored to its original splendor, retaining the original layout and traditional features, the gracious proportions and weathered building materials speak for themselves.

The ground floor once served as the 'canava' - wine cellar and workshop - of the Mansion. The cylindrical troughs sunk into the ground, once used for distilling the vinsanto, provides unusual lighting features to the interior. Three large barn-style doors lead from the cobbled courtyard into the various living areas. The smooth-edged carved interior provides a cool and relaxing haven during the hot summer days. The well equipped traditional-style central kitchen leads into the beautifully lit dining room, perfect for leisurely meals with friends and family. Arched doorways on either side of the kitchen allows for an easy flow through the house.

listing.listing_description: Twilight Peak, located within the renowned One Steamboat Place complex, is a beautiful luxury vacation rental with views of the Yampa Valley and extremely convenient access to the Steamboat slopes. With four bedrooms that sleep eleven, it's ideal for large families or groups of friends seeking the cozy privacy of a home base during a Colorado adventure.Tall glass doors illuminate the suite's beautiful open-plan living area, opening to a private patio with barbeque grill and lovely valley views. Inside, the elegant dining table for ten, with red wooden chairs and a large leather bench seat, is ideal for hearty dinners together. Beside it, the large sectional couch and two leather armchairs surround the suite's central stone hearth, with fireplace and mounted flat screen television, where you'll stay toasty while sharing nighttime laughs. The kitchen comes fully equipped with Viking appliances and a breakfast bar for three.The light-filled master bedroom is located on its own side of the suite, and includes a king bed, a stone hearth with gas fireplace and flat screen television, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and jetted bathtub. One the other side of the suite, there are two other bedrooms with king bed and ensuite bathrooms—one with stand-alone shower and bath, one with shower/bath combo—and a fourth room with two twin-over-double bunk beds and shared access to the hall bathroom, ideal for kids.At Twilight Peak, you'll savor One Steamboat Place's world-class communal areas, epitomizing Rocky Mountain class. In the evening, relax in the stunning Great Room by the massive stone hearth flanked by two-story windows with beautiful views, or shoot billiards in the game parlor while your kids enjoy the Little Tykes room.The main entrance of One Steamboat Place is just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola, giving you unrivaled access to some of the best skiing in the world. After the winter thaw, Rolling Stone Golf Course awaits you less than two miles away. City Market and Steamboat Springs Old Town are also just minutes away by car, as is Steamboat Springs Airport. And after a few hard days on the mountains, treat yourself to Mother Nature's healing touch at Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A secluded Balinese oasis with a full staff and driver on hand, Villa Impian Manis takes all the stress out of planning your next relaxing Luxury Retreats getaway. Located in the center of Bali’s Denpasar peninsula, this luxurious three-bedroom is within fifteen-kilometers of the coast on three sides, and the towns of Kuta, Sukawati, and Ubud if you travel inland. Nearby, you’ll find golf, waterparks, ancient temples, nature reserves, and plenty of gorgeous beachfront.Balinese architecture has always been one of the most open-air friendly disciplines, celebrating the near perfect weather of Bali by inviting it inside. Instantly, the smooth, earthy tones of Impian Manis will have you feeling relaxed. With so many unique living areas scattered throughout the estate, you won’t have any trouble finding the perfect place to sit with friends or lay down for an afternoon nap.Impian Manis comes outfitted with Wi-Fi, satellite television, and air conditioning to keep you cool and connected during your stay. Chef, Butler housekkeper are available to cater to your needs. The villa features a formal and alfresco dining, a barbecue, and a fully equipped kitchen. Outside, the swimming pool, bale pavilion, and day bed are sure to rejuvenate you and your guests. And, back inside there’s a spa room with massage tables.Bali is known for its world-class surf, and Bingin Beach, on the island’s west coast, is among the best. A favorite among locals and returning visitors, Binging is a little off the beaten path, so if you’re looking for a secluded spot to work on your tan, this is the place for you. On the southern coast, Pandawa Beach is better for casual swimmers, although surfing is available as well if you swim out past the reef. Pandawa is hidden by massive limestone cliffs and features many shops, restaurants, and activities along its sandy coast. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Bali National Golf Course is a straight shot east, about twelve-kilometers. There, you’ll find dynamic landscapes that create a challenging course, as well as showcase incredible ocean views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
