listing.listing_description: Ideal for family vacations and groups of friends, Sunrise Ski Haus is a modern 4-bedroom mountain home pocketed away in Christie Heights, one of Breckenridge’s premier neighborhoods. The Breckenridge Connect Gondola is under a mile from the villa and will whisk you away to Peaks 7 and 8 or down to the Main Street where you’ll discover a rich selection of restaurants, bars, shops and local festivities.Sunrise Ski Haus has been built to take full advantage of its elevated position and alpine setting. Natural wood, stone and marble blend seamlessly into the forested surroundings and large picture windows and vaulted ceilings accentuate the magnificent views over Baldy Mountain and Breckenridge Town. Like the pine-scented air, the décor is clean and fresh and families with teenagers and adult children will appreciate the split-level living areas.An impressive ground floor living space is at the heart of this welcoming home and adjoins the granite-topped professional kitchen with its 4-burner stove and griddle. The open-plan ground floor is a great spot for mingling, discussing the day’s adventures over dinner around the 10-seater dining table or stretching out on the leather sofa with your iPad or the latest bestseller. In the evenings your party might like to gather around the fire and watch a movie here on the flat-screen television or head downstairs to the more private living room which enjoys its own extra-large television screen, wet bar and feature fireplace. An outdoor patio with private hot tub, fire pit and gas grill is the perfect spot for unwinding after a day spent hiking or skiing in the mountains.Fresh air tends to make you sleepy and you’ll be grateful that there are plenty of comfortable bedrooms at Sunrise. Plush king-size beds are ready to settle you into a deep slumber in the Master bedrooms on the main and lower levels and both rooms are served by deluxe en-suite bathrooms. Bedroom One is resplendent with a stand-alone tub and shower, while Bedroom Two has a shower and access to the patio. There’s a queen and twin bed in the third bedroom and a bathroom shared with Bedroom Four which is great for kids with its two twin bunk beds. All rooms have televisions.Ski slopes surround you in this neck of the woods, and you are less than a mile from access to them, but if you prefer to explore the area by car there’s a 2-car garage within the property. The nearest airports are Leadville (45 miles) and Denver International (105 miles).Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Dalah is a stunning beachfront luxury villa on the island of Koh Samui. Situated near Bophut on the northeast coast, the villa's estate borders a sublime stretch of Big Buddha Beach and enjoys panoramic ocean views of the Gulf of Thailand and the island of Koh Phan Ngan. Beautiful outdoor living areas, exquisite interior spaces, and three sumptuous bedrooms create a unique private world for an unforgettable vacation with family and friends.The private estate includes three pavilions surrounding a beautiful Buddhist garden, along with a gorgeous terrace with nineteen-meter infinite swimming pool bordering the beach's pristine white sand. Savor enchanting hours on elegant loungers in the South Pacific sun, and float in the scintillating pool while gazing out on breathtaking, unobstructed vistas. Plunge into the azure sea and return for a delicious alfresco lunch on the terrace. Linger outdoors through the evening, sipping sunset cocktails and relishing the nocturnal breeze.Lovely glass doors join the terrace and the main pavilion, inviting an exquisite open-air feel indoors. Relax with a bottle of wine and your favorite TV shows in the beautiful lounge. Cook fabulous Thai meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and feast together at the superb dining table. The main living room features high, peaked ceilings of rich wood, evoking classic Thai tradition, while the elegant furnishings provide modern comfort in harmony with the precious natural surroundings. Your vacation rental additionally includes excellent staff and provisions, including daily breakfast.The master bedroom is in its own pavilion. Spacious and exquisitely furnished, it features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom. The two guestrooms occupy the third pavilion; one has a king bed and one has two twins, and they both have ensuite bathrooms. All of the villa's bedrooms include safes, ceiling fans, and doors to the main terrace.In addition to your direct access to Big Buddha Beach, you're just minutes by car from some of the island's finest and most renowned beaches, including Bophut and Chaweng. Fisherman's Village is only three kilometers away, and Wat Plai Laem about three. The airport is only four kilometers away, and complimentary two-way transfer is provided. Baan Dalah is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indulge in a luxury stay with eco-friendly cred at Villa Tropical. This Costa Rica vacation rental is stylishly appointed and sustainably designed, with contemporary open-plan rooms and features like solar-powered water heaters. Its location in the exclusive Mar Vista community puts you close to both the quiet white-sand beaches of Playa Flamingo and the lively surf scene in Tamarindo.Villa Tropical is set on three lush private acres with mountain and ocean views. The house is laid out around an expansive terrace with a infinity pool, plenty of chaise longues, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, and shaded sitting and dining areas. There’s space for the whole family to play games on the lawn or the half basketball court.The interiors of Villa Tropical are designed to allow cooling cross breezes to waft through the living spaces, lit by energy-saving LED bulbs and served by solar-heated water that’s then recycled for use in the gardens. But that doesn’t mean they sacrifice style or comfort. The heart of the home is a beautiful open-plan great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen that can be opened to the terrace via sliding glass walls. Details like mod lounge chairs, natural-fiber rugs and stunning waterfall countertops feel both chic and inviting.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house, and one in a guest house that could be used as a honeymoon or in-law suite. In the main house, you’ll find a master suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views, and two bedrooms that share a bath: one with a queen bed, the other with two twin beds. The guest-house suite features a king bed, en-suite bathroom, al-fresco shower and views stretching out over the pool, mountains and Pacific.Designed as a sustainable community for families, retirees and everyone in between, Mar Vista is perfect for a holiday close to great golf, snorkeling, diving, fishing, stand-up paddleboarding and hiking trails. Villa Tropical is a 1-minute walk from the community clubhouse and a 3-mile drive or less from three different beaches. To see more of Costa Rica or enjoy a memorable night out, make the short drive to Tamarindo and sample its shopping, dining and entertainment.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to a sunny retreat with a secret garden in the heart of London at Pembroke. Set in an elegant townhouse in the city’s fashionable Kensington area, this charming vacation rental is bright and vintage-inspired, and opens to a lovely private outdoor space. Use its three bedrooms for a sightseeing holiday with family, a getaway with other couples or even a city honeymoon.On warmer mornings, bring your coffee out to the house’s walled terrace to sip; on sunny afternoons, relax with a glass of wine in the al-fresco sitting area. In cooler weather, a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi inside make it easy to relax after a busy day exploring London.Pembroke opens to an inviting living area that stretches the full length of the house, with a living room at the front featuring built-in bookcases, a fireplace and a window seat overlooking the front garden, and a conservatory at the back that opens to stairs into the garden. Downstairs, the fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and gorgeous cabinetry in a deep blue. It’s adjacent to a TV lounge and a dining room that also has garden access.This luxury residence has three bedrooms with double beds: one with an en-suite bathroom and two that share a bathroom. Like the rest of the house, the bedrooms are bright and spacious, with pretty, traditional details such as built-in cabinets, paneled walls and floor-length drapes.The villa’s prime Kensington location means it’s less than a 10-minute drive from attractions such as Harrods and Hyde Park, and less than a 20-minute drive from Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace. It’s well worth traveling a bit farther to see the splendor of St. Paul’s Cathedral, delve into British history at the Tower of London or peek behind the scenes of the Harry Potter films on the Warner Brothers studio tour.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rushing water and classic Colorado scenery are the backdrop to a relaxed ski holiday at River Song at the Shores. Look out at valley views from this contemporary Breckenridge vacation rental—and walk to a shuttle stop, recreation trail and private access to a ski run. Three bedrooms have room for nine friends and family out for mountain fun together.Listen to the river running past from a private patio with a barbecue, firepit, hot tub and, in the summer, an al-fresco dining area. If you’ve spent the day on the slopes, cozy up with the help of the media room, gas fireplace, wine fridge, cable TV and Wi-Fi, or prep gear for the next day’s adventures with the help of the laundry facilities.Natural textures and bright, airy spaces give the villa an ambience of inviting mountain luxury. Stone and wood lend warmth to the open-concept great room, while oversized windows and vaulted ceilings bring in plenty of light. The L-shaped space features a sitting area, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dining area for eight.Each of the three bedrooms at River Song has a king bed. Two of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own gas fireplace, and the third bedroom shares access to a hall bathroom.River Song is a 4-minute walk from the 4 O’Clock ski run, which guests can enter via private access, and a 5-minute walk from the Summit Stage shuttle bus service, which puts the best of Breckenridge within easy reach. It’s also easy to access the Breckenridge-to-Dillon recreation trail from the entrance to The Shores community. If you’re driving, it’s only 3 miles to the shops, restaurants and activities in charming downtown Breckenridge.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Look out over azure seas and lush green hilltops from the perfectly named Villa Belle. Set on a hillside overlooking Choeng Mon, this Koh Samui vacation rental has gorgeous views—and equally appealing living spaces from which to enjoy them. Reserve its three bedrooms for a luxury getaway with family, a tropical escape with friends or even a dreamy honeymoon in the sun.Your holiday at Villa Belle begins with an airport transfer and includes a daily continental breakfast, shuttle service to and from the beach, and full-time Thai chef service. Spend lazy days watching the sun on the sea from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, loungers, al-fresco dining and a barbecue, or find your flow in the yoga area. After dark, flip on the Apple TV or satellite TV, sample the villa’s wine selection or catch up via Wi-Fi.Inside the villa, high ceilings and an open-concept layout are paired with traditional-inspired furnishings and artwork for a clean, contemporary look. Nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass doors link the living and dining areas to the terrace for uninterrupted sea views. Those same vistas are reflected in the mirrored breakfast bar in the well-equipped kitchen.Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, sound system and an outdoor space, whether a deck or lounge area. As in the main living areas, the bedrooms are a stylish mix of the traditional and the modern.Though it’s set on a rise above the water, Villa Belle is just a half mile from the picture-perfect sands of Choeng Mon Beach, meaning that you’re just minutes away from a nap on its soft white sands, a massage or snack from a local vendor or a swim in the clear waters. It’s also a short drive from the nearest golf course and the lively outdoor market of Fisherman’s Village.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live out your California dreams at a quintessentially L.A. home: Elegance Modern. This contemporary vacation rental is both chic and comfortable, with luxury amenities and a laid-back ambience. Perhaps best of all, its West Hollywood location is just minutes from museums, attractions, and shopping and dining in one of the city’s most vibrant neighborhoods.Relax in the sunshine with family and friends in a private backyard with a swimming pool, hot tub, plenty of loungers, an al-fresco living room and a fireplace. If you’ve been out exploring the city all day, serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine fridge and settle in for a screening in the home theater, or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.With its free-flowing layout, neutral tones, colorful artwork and glam metallic accents, Elegance Modern epitomizes Los Angeles cool. A velour sofa and slipcovered chairs invite you to sit for a while in the open-concept living and dining area. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen has two islands, a breakfast nook and gorgeous stone countertops, as well as a host of gourmet appliances.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a guest house. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a double bed and access to a hall bathroom. The guest house is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and its own kitchen.From the villa’s setting in a residential neighborhood, it’s less than a 10-minute drive to shopping and entertainment at The Grove, the collection at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the iconic streets of Hollywood. Take the kids for a day out at Universal Studios, or chase more grown-up thrills in the tempting boutiques of Rodeo Drive, both within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From touchdown to takeoff, you’ll be well taken care of at this fully-staffed Beverly Hills-style home in Playa del Carmen. Start your morning with a squash match, a workout, or a stroll along Playacar Beach. In the afternoon, snap a few photos at the Mayan Ruins of Tulum before heading home for an alfresco dinner. After, grab a drink at the fully-stocked honor bar and relax by the moonlit pool. Just like the mansions of Beverly Hills, this architecturally astounding home is the perfect combination of relaxing beach vibes and chic, Hollywood glamour. From the wrap-around pool to the spiralling staircase, and everywhere in-between, Villa Aqua loves to show off its curves. The sunny living room, with a ceiling so high it’s totally fine to have a full-size palm tree in it, is the perfect place to gather with good friends. Set your focus on having fun while the private chef, butler, housekeepers, and more, take care of everything else. Take the party outside and open another bottle of wine. If you’re craving a late-night snack, fire up the barbecue and grill up some fresh seafood. The golfer in your group will surely notice the beautiful fairways of Hard Rock Campo de Golf that run through Aqua’s gated community. After a morning round, head out for brunch in Centro Playa del Carmen, there are a few great spots on the streets just off the beach. While you’re there, check out the bars and nightclub options for later. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Nestled within Gros Islet near the northern tip of St. Lucia, Xhale is a beautiful luxury villa featuring expansive views of the Caribbean Sea and Anse Galet Bay framed by verdant shoreline hills. With four bedrooms sleeping eight, it's the ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests, groups of friends, and families seeking privacy and total comfort in this dreamy island paradise.The villa is perfectly designed to create seamless transitions between its indoor and outdoor spaces. A lovely terrace with infinity swimming pool and ocean views forms the villa's peaceful core, while the wraparound balcony includes additional lounge areas for plein air relaxation. In the afternoon, fire up the grill for some delicious seafood barbeque, and gather around the fire pit in the evening as cooler breezes blow.Sliding glass doors create an alfresco feel within the villa's living spaces, where the exquisite décor and furnishings echo the natural beauty of the island and sea. On one side of the pool terrace, an open-plan kitchen-and-dining area features an ocean-view table for eight and a luminous, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar. On the other side of the pool terrace, a spacious living room includes a large TV and sumptuous furnishings. These two wings are connected by an additional lounge and the gorgeous stone wall extending from the earth through both of the villa's levels. The villa also includes a well-equipped, ocean-view fitness room as well as a quiet office space.Xhale includes four beautiful bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms, private balconies, and ocean views. The master bedroom has a king size bed, and its bathroom features a stand-alone bath beside an ocean-view glass wall. The other three bedrooms all have queen beds. With exquisite décor and cozy bedding, the bedrooms are ideal for afternoon private time and nights of peaceful rest.Xhale provides an ideal location for exploring St. Lucia. You're just a short drive or bicycle ride to Plantation Beach, Pigeon Island Beach, and Reduit Beach, while the natural treasure of Pigeon Island National Park is only a few kilometers away. If you dream of Caribbean golf, St. Lucia Golf and Country Club is just minutes from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cozy up just outside downtown Breckenridge at Brooks Hill Hideaway. Tucked away in a grove of pines, this charming five-bedroom vacation rental offers a quiet respite for up to fourteen friends or family members. But despite its secluded location, it’s a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, plus shopping and dining in the town’s historic center.In the summer, return from a day of hiking or biking to heat up the barbecue and linger outside under the heat lamps. In the winter, watch the snow fall on the forest while soaking in the private al-fresco hot tub. Inside, you’ll find equally inviting amenities from a cable TV and Wi-Fi to a gas fireplace.This luxury villa is a modern take on the mountain chalet, with a bright, open-concept great room at its center. The sitting area is laid out around a welcoming stone fireplace, and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen is the perfect spot to sit for a chat. You can also plan the next day’s adventures around one of two dining tables in the space, or let the kids watch a movie in the separate media room while the grown-ups catch up.Brooks Hill Hideaway has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as a jetted tub. Two other bedrooms have a queen bed and double bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom is a bunk room with a twin-over-double bunk bed and a trundle bed.If your Colorado holiday is focused on skiing, you’ll appreciate being just an 8-minute drive from the BreckConnect gondola and a 10-minute drive from the base of Breckenridge Ski Resort. And if not, you’ll enjoy being less than a 10-minute drive from shops, restaurants and the Breckenridge National Historic District.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make the views from Sunset Cliffs your own at Villa Bermuda Beach. This stunning spot is known for its surf break and sunsets, and makes an incredible setting for a relaxed getaway or destination wedding—or the honeymoon after. The villa showcases the postcard-worthy panorama in nearly every room, and can accommodate up to six friends and family members in its three bedrooms.This luxury property opens to a deck built right on the rocky cliffs that features sunny lounging areas, an umbrella-shaded dining table, a barbecue and a private oceanfront hot tub. Rinse off in the al-fresco shower before heading inside to relax in front of the cable TV or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.Inside Villa Bermuda Beach, the seaside location shows up in yacht-style wood paneling, beach-inspired artwork and, of course, the wall of nearly floor-to-ceiling windows and doors that opens the great room to the front deck (plus a second courtyard-style deck tucked away from the ocean). Take a seat on the sofa and chairs in front of the fireplace and TV or at the breakfast bar, or whip up a meal from fresh California produce in the fully equipped kitchen.This vacation rental boasts three bedrooms with king beds: one master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that share a bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are bright, beachy and modern, with warm wood paneling, serene neutral bedding and the occasional pop of color in a playful area rug.With Bermuda Beach less than five minutes away and Ocean Beach with its cafés and shops just over 1 mile away, you may not want to leave the Beaches neighborhood during your stay. But a short drive into central San Diego of less than 10 miles will bring you to attractions like the charming Gaslamp Quarter, the well-preserved Old Town historic park and even the San Diego Zoo.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: As the sun rises over the Sea of Cortez, you’ll have the perfect view from the terrace of your luxurious Los Cabos vacation rental. Taking in the breathtaking view while enjoying an alfresco breakfast by the infinity pool, discussing an afternoon golf trip and which restaurant to try in town this evening, what a perfect way to start the day.Lounging on the terrace is a great lazy afternoon activity. An alfresco barbeque lunch by the fire pit and drinks by the pool are all you need to accompany the amazing view. For dinner, enjoy the fully equipped kitchen, wine fridge, espresso machine, and formal dining for eight. After-supper drinks and conversations around the fireplace are a great way to make use of the indoor living space.Natural vegetation provides privacy for the villa and terrace. Built with that in mind, the main living room of Cielos opens up to the terrace, the pool, and beyond to the sea. The traditional Mexican architecture lends itself to appreciating the outdoors, merging spaces so you’re never far from the sunrise. Stone floors, exposed wood beams, and a clay tile roof keep the villa feeling earthy and natural. Couple that with modern fixtures and designer furnishings, and you have perfect contrast for enjoying the outdoors with the comforts of the villa always close by.With great bedroom options for the whole family, Cielos has everyone covered. The master has a king bed, an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and a bathtub, a dual vanity, as well as a walk-in closet. Two of the other bedrooms feature a king bed and an ensuite, while the fourth has two twin beds and is great for kids.Nearby you’ll find yourself with full access to the world class facilities at the Palmilla Golf Club. This Jack Nicklaus designed course features some of the most challenging holes in championship golf, and some of the most amazing views of Los Cabos. Enjoy the spa and fine dining at their restaurant as well.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: C’est La Vie is its own little oasis on the Trouya Pointe peninsula, where privacy, peace and tranquility are only interrupted by bird songs and crashing of waves. Landscaped gardens completely surround the property highlighted by yellow, red, pink and gold flowers. The main house and its adjoining cottage and apartment are truly unique and reveal both traditional Caribbean as well as Balinese influences.The full-service villa team will make you feel like you are staying at your own private boutique hotel!Start each day on the upper veranda where a lounge set and breakfast table give you a perfect vantage points for your eyes to wander from ornate curved eaves to carved hardwood railings to the endless green landscape. Saunter down to the swimming pool and dip your head under the waterfall. Dry off on a chaise longue before retiring to the nearby daybed. Refresh yourself under the outdoor shower then join your guests at the Banana Bar or fire up the barbecue.There are several living rooms where you can all gather. Each one boasts soft sofas adorned with designer fabrics and surrounded by elegant antique wooden furniture, accessories and attractive louver windows. Enjoy meals in the dining area or one of several al fresco tables. A professional chef can also be retained to create gourmet feasts.C’est La Vie contains five of St. Lucia’s most exquisitely designed bedrooms, each named after a local tree and clad with designer fabrics, soft linens and exotic, tasteful furnishings. Three bedrooms are in the main home, all with a private veranda, en-suite bathrooms, including walk-in shower and air conditioning. A fourth room is found in the separate cottage also with en-suite bathroom, private veranda and a study. The final room is in a comfortably furnished apartment at pool level. Its en-suite houses a handmade soak tub.A short pathway leads from C'est la Vie to a tranquil, secluded cove from which snorkelers may search for reef fish or lobster and strong swimmers may circumnavigate the peninsula and find themselves in another quiet cove with a beautiful sandy beach. It can also be reached on foot in about five minutes; either cove is ideal for a picnic or a barbecue.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Scudo is a fashionable luxury property set in an exclusive location in the heart of Florence! On the third floor of a historical Florentine palazzo with an elevator, Scudo has been completely transformed into a calming and serene urban oasis. And while Scudo is an elegant and very sophisticated apartment, you will feel both welcome and exceptionally comfortable. Get the holiday you deserve!Kick back in this most sophisticated area of Tuscany. This vacation rental features a sauna, so you can get into that sweet relaxed mood any time of day. Other perks at this private apartment include satellite television and Wi-Fi. For an extra cost, you can also receive cooking, housekeeping and babysitting services, as well as villa pre-stocking and airport transfers. Just ask our dedicated concierge so you can hit your vacation running!This exquisite four-bedroom apartment boasts traditional architecture that dates back to the 1600s. A clever monochromatic palette unifies the entire space including the minimalistic furnishings with clean lines. Lounge around in the living area with an eye for retro-inspired design. The stylish formal dining area includes seating for eight and lies adjacent the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.Four magnificent bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking apartment. Three bedrooms offer en-suite bathrooms. The fourth bedroom will enjoy access to the hall bathroom with a jetted tub. The master suite offers a king bed, a fireplace and a lounge. All of the sleeping quarters provide air conditioning.Scudo makes a great bet for a family holiday or a decadent honeymoon in Italy. You will be situated in lovely downtown Florence and within walking distance of Piazza del Duomo. The famous towns of Montalcino, Montepulciano and Pienza are all within easy driving distance and well worth a visit. As you will soon find out, Tuscan cuisine is itself quite simple, focusing on natural flavors – and perhaps therein lies some part of the secret to what Italians call la dolce vita, or living ‘the sweet life.’ Book your stay today with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
